summary: A street girl gang clashes with racist local gangsters after one of the girls starts dating an Afro-Japanese man.
cast: Meiko Kaji|Rikiya Yasuoka|Tatsuya Fuji|Jirô Okazaki|Yuki Arikawa|Tomoko Aki|Yôko Takagi|Akemi Nara|Setsuko Minami|Mari Koiso|Mie Hanabusa|Nobuko Aoki|Saburô Hiromatsu|Tomio Aoki|Hajime Sugiyama|Shuntarô Tamamura|Kiyoshi Kamoda|Hiroshi Ichimura|Ken Sanders|Hiroshi Chô|Shirô Ôhama|Tatsuya Hamaguchi|Densuke Hikari|Michihiro Arimura|Tadayuki Kitagami|Hideyuki Kimura|Yasuhiro Kameyama|Masami Maki|Tamaki Komiyama|Masashi Himuro|Yasuo Shigeoka|Ichirô Taki|Katari Gideon|Kusu Matsu|Eri Ishiyama|Yumi Kobayashi|Eva Mari|Elizabeth Maria Mori|Luna Takamura
title: Nora-neko rokku: Sekkusu hantaa
